TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: 表示与 关联的页眉或页脚。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
当 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> 在打印预览模式下显示时，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> 提供该设计器的页眉和页脚信息。 如果提供了工作流设计器，用户可以配置页眉和页脚上**页眉/页脚**选项卡上**页面设置**对话框。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> 属性。 在本示例中，使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> 的 Bounds 来计算 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter>，以便在页眉/页脚的左上角绘制图像。
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#74](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#74)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#74](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#74)]

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> 属性。 在此示例中，使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> 的边界以及 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> 的位置和大小来计算 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>。
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#75](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#75)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#75](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#75)]
